# 11 Mon

## \[AI 스쿨 1기\] 6주차 DAY 1

출처 : [https://github.com/sujiny-tech/k-digital-training-AI-dev/blob/main/Machine-Learning-basics/Probability%20Distributions\_II.md](https://github.com/sujiny-tech/k-digital-training-AI-dev/blob/main/Machine-Learning-basics/Probability%20Distributions_II.md)

### 가우시안 분포\(Gaussian Distribution\)

* 가우시안 분포가 일어나는 여러가지 상황
  * 정보이론에서 엔트로피를 최대화시키는 확률분포
  * 중심극한 정리

    > [![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/72974863/104146672-d41edd80-540e-11eb-9ae2-e81140f520de.png)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/72974863/104146672-d41edd80-540e-11eb-9ae2-e81140f520de.png)

    > [그림 출처](https://ko.wikipedia.org/wiki/%EC%A4%91%EC%8B%AC_%EA%B7%B9%ED%95%9C_%EC%A0%95%EB%A6%AC)
* 단일 변수 x

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

* D차원 벡터 x

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/ac9687802bbc095f0eb7c79363c01209c164e8b63a1c7b72bd7d326ba1f16506/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b5c6d757d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/ac9687802bbc095f0eb7c79363c01209c164e8b63a1c7b72bd7d326ba1f16506/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b5c6d757d) : D차원의 평균 벡터

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/627ca7a195f848f64d0f606afd18dd4dcdaf32764853b07d11dda793af05d38c/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b5c5369676d617d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/627ca7a195f848f64d0f606afd18dd4dcdaf32764853b07d11dda793af05d38c/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b5c5369676d617d) : DxD크기를 가지는 공분산 행렬

  > 평균과 분산으로 주어진게 아니라 위의 형태의 함수를 가지고 있으며 mu, sigma가 파라미터로 주어져있을 때, 확률밀도함수의 평균과 공분산이 mu, sigma가 된다는 것을 유도❗

* 가우시안 분포의 기하학적인 형태
  * x에 대한 함수적 종속성은 지수부에 등장하는 이차형식\(quadratic form\)

    > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  * [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/627ca7a195f848f64d0f606afd18dd4dcdaf32764853b07d11dda793af05d38c/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b5c5369676d617d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/627ca7a195f848f64d0f606afd18dd4dcdaf32764853b07d11dda793af05d38c/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b5c5369676d617d)가 공분산으로 주어진 것은 아니므로 처음부터 이 행렬이 대칭이라고 미리 가정할 필요 x❗
  * 하지만, 선형대수에서 배웠듯 **이차형식에 나타나는 행렬은 오직 대칭부분만이 그 값에 기여한다는 사실**을 기억하자❗

    > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

    > 따라서, [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/627ca7a195f848f64d0f606afd18dd4dcdaf32764853b07d11dda793af05d38c/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b5c5369676d617d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/627ca7a195f848f64d0f606afd18dd4dcdaf32764853b07d11dda793af05d38c/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b5c5369676d617d)가 **대칭행렬인 것**으로 간주할 수 있음.

  * 대칭행렬의 성질에 따라서 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/627ca7a195f848f64d0f606afd18dd4dcdaf32764853b07d11dda793af05d38c/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b5c5369676d617d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/627ca7a195f848f64d0f606afd18dd4dcdaf32764853b07d11dda793af05d38c/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b5c5369676d617d)를 아래와 같이 나타낼 수 있음.

    > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/49a684fa68aa06ae1e37885e24e0f8827e155d30f6ff6beae4024e826c10820b/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c5369676d613d555e7b547d5c4c616d6264612673706163653b55)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/49a684fa68aa06ae1e37885e24e0f8827e155d30f6ff6beae4024e826c10820b/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c5369676d613d555e7b547d5c4c616d6264612673706163653b55)

    * [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)는 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/4687c7dd2ed3700d4aa773341ea945212c671d299f68d9d4a25ee499cfcdf7d8/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f445e7b327d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/4687c7dd2ed3700d4aa773341ea945212c671d299f68d9d4a25ee499cfcdf7d8/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f445e7b327d)개의 행렬 합이며 그 중 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/5ecd750c16b9e64adde1854a0e6dcf4aa3489e2bb887a3e9ac6dc8640db52ebb/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f695c6e6f745c65717569762673706163653b6a)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/5ecd750c16b9e64adde1854a0e6dcf4aa3489e2bb887a3e9ac6dc8640db52ebb/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f695c6e6f745c65717569762673706163653b6a)에 관해 영행렬이 됨.

      > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

    * 따라서 정리하면, [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/24970baaf35252eb260ac3e6c34acad27c17c1a95d344e3edb6f2591b0b10751/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f455b5c6d61746862667b787d5c6d61746862667b787d5e7b547d5d3d5c6d755c6d755e7b547d2673706163653b2b5c5369676d61)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/24970baaf35252eb260ac3e6c34acad27c17c1a95d344e3edb6f2591b0b10751/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f455b5c6d61746862667b787d5c6d61746862667b787d5e7b547d5d3d5c6d755c6d755e7b547d2673706163653b2b5c5369676d61)임.
    * 확률변수의 벡터 x를 위한 공분산은 다음과 같음.

      > 위에서 게산한 결과를 이용하면, [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/5fb152c556108d3ed56b985fcb20e9f0a43a04d9f47f50d08167796484bb4686/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f636f765b5c6d61746862667b787d5d3d5c5369676d61)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/5fb152c556108d3ed56b985fcb20e9f0a43a04d9f47f50d08167796484bb4686/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f636f765b5c6d61746862667b787d5d3d5c5369676d61)❗

### 

### 조건부 가우시안 분포\(Conditional Gaussian Distribution\)

* D차원의 확률변수 벡터 x가 가우시안 분포 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/2d6c478a963d7a0203fbb370ab73aec762410b0c2429620982401327282176f5/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f4e285c6d61746862667b787d7c5c6d752c2673706163653b5c5369676d6129)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/2d6c478a963d7a0203fbb370ab73aec762410b0c2429620982401327282176f5/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f4e285c6d61746862667b787d7c5c6d752c2673706163653b5c5369676d6129)를 따른다고 하자. x를 두 그룹의 확률변수들로 나눴을때, 한 그룹이 주어졌을때 **나머지 그룹의 조건부 확률도 가우시안 분포를 따르며**, **각 그룹의 주변확률변수 또한 가우시안 분포를 따름**.

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > * [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/06aea75ec98d899365a837271ebb161c6f74a5b3c0d622c546cd6c23ec123c15/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/06aea75ec98d899365a837271ebb161c6f74a5b3c0d622c546cd6c23ec123c15/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d) : M개의 원소를 가짐.

  > 평균벡터 : [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > 공분산 행렬 : [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)의 형태를 가진다고 하자.

  > 공분산의 역행렬 : [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/1d3fa4d21090c90e710a5367926a4fe6a89a240399a05dfb4181b8dbf381ae3d/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c4c616d6264612673706163653b3d5c5369676d615f7b2d317d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/1d3fa4d21090c90e710a5367926a4fe6a89a240399a05dfb4181b8dbf381ae3d/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c4c616d6264612673706163653b3d5c5369676d615f7b2d317d) \( 정확도 행렬\(precision matrix\)를 사용하는 것이 수식을 간편하게 함\)

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  * 지수부의 이차형식을 파티션을 사용해서 전개하면 다음과 같다.

    > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

* **완전제곱식\(Completing the Square\) 방법**

  * 변형해서 함수g\(xa\)를 찾는 것이 목표❗

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/b5ec221a4fdb58c83acbe241fa169d9db3346a66881731ce284c016f18d95d58/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d2c2673706163653b5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d293d67285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d295c616c706861)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/b5ec221a4fdb58c83acbe241fa169d9db3346a66881731ce284c016f18d95d58/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d2c2673706163653b5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d293d67285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d295c616c706861)라 하며, 이때 이 함수의 적분이 1이고, α는 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/06aea75ec98d899365a837271ebb161c6f74a5b3c0d622c546cd6c23ec123c15/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/06aea75ec98d899365a837271ebb161c6f74a5b3c0d622c546cd6c23ec123c15/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d)와 독립적임.

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > α는 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/06aea75ec98d899365a837271ebb161c6f74a5b3c0d622c546cd6c23ec123c15/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/06aea75ec98d899365a837271ebb161c6f74a5b3c0d622c546cd6c23ec123c15/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d)에 관해 적분했으므로, [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/fc9f3dc22eadccba5352379758eae1e9a62c5ca7bd95554a5be3bd104e849ff3/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/fc9f3dc22eadccba5352379758eae1e9a62c5ca7bd95554a5be3bd104e849ff3/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d)의 주변확률.

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)이므로, [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/091f5edc1846f320cef9793478732590b62d4efe700877b96484b68ee2ebdb65/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f67285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d293d70285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d7c5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/091f5edc1846f320cef9793478732590b62d4efe700877b96484b68ee2ebdb65/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f67285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d293d70285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d7c5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d29)❗

  > 즉, 함수 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/f4d0c6caae457dd85f3eb3658a25865af73813f2ea95c67a252a7175022adfe4/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f67285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/f4d0c6caae457dd85f3eb3658a25865af73813f2ea95c67a252a7175022adfe4/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f67285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d29)를 찾는 것이 목표

  > 이때, 이차 형식을 완전제곱식 형식으로 변형하면,

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/08c68053604ca492c4cb508851234948fc272627c40ae03ff0bd4c69e354a351/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f2d5c667261637b317d7b327d5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d5e7b547d415c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d2b785f7b617d5e7b547d6d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/08c68053604ca492c4cb508851234948fc272627c40ae03ff0bd4c69e354a351/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f2d5c667261637b317d7b327d5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d5e7b547d415c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d2b785f7b617d5e7b547d6d)

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.) [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)❗

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > 이때, b는 normalize하기 위한 상수

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/f4d0c6caae457dd85f3eb3658a25865af73813f2ea95c67a252a7175022adfe4/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f67285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/f4d0c6caae457dd85f3eb3658a25865af73813f2ea95c67a252a7175022adfe4/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f67285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d29)에 해당하는 부분 : [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > α에 해당하는 부분 : [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/534d33c07306d6b8bcbe9635741636f328b4ceaeb5e7879143b4f39016409198/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c667261637b617d7b627d5c7465787475707b6578707d5c6c6566742673706163653b5c7b2673706163653b5c7461752673706163653b5c72696768742673706163653b5c7d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/534d33c07306d6b8bcbe9635741636f328b4ceaeb5e7879143b4f39016409198/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c667261637b617d7b627d5c7465787475707b6578707d5c6c6566742673706163653b5c7b2673706163653b5c7461752673706163653b5c72696768742673706163653b5c7d)

* 가우시안 분포의 지수부

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > 이때, 가운데 두 값은 transpose하면 같은 값이고, 마지막항은 x와 관계없으르모 상수 취급

  > 이차항을 통해 공분산 행렬을 구하고, 이를 통해 일차항의 계수인 평균벡터 mu를 구할 수 있음❗

* 앞서 파티션한 부분에서

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/06aea75ec98d899365a837271ebb161c6f74a5b3c0d622c546cd6c23ec123c15/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/06aea75ec98d899365a837271ebb161c6f74a5b3c0d622c546cd6c23ec123c15/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d)의 이차항 : [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/75074164cd9bf13b1d2a5e688ec05a2265d70893ba6b6c2412552490fe7acddd/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f2d5c667261637b317d7b327d5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d5e7b547d5c4c616d6264615f7b61617d5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/75074164cd9bf13b1d2a5e688ec05a2265d70893ba6b6c2412552490fe7acddd/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f2d5c667261637b317d7b327d5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d5e7b547d5c4c616d6264615f7b61617d5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d)

  > 따라서 공분산 -&gt; [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/c90429d5c314c570ed11216d6863f15c1df84fd0ac02445b7f7ba13f23d3e056/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c5369676d615f7b617c627d3d5c4c616d6264615f7b61617d5e7b2d317d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/c90429d5c314c570ed11216d6863f15c1df84fd0ac02445b7f7ba13f23d3e056/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c5369676d615f7b617c627d3d5c4c616d6264615f7b61617d5e7b2d317d)

  > 이를 통해 일차항을 정리해서 계수를 통해 평균벡터를 구하면,  
  >  [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

### 

### 주변 가우시안 분포\(Marginal Gaussian Distributions\)

* 목표❗

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/318eb4295aa018681aaf42b1b0fbfb13549f9bc4271cfbe0a97d3ebb14758afd/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d293d5c696e742673706163653b70285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d2c5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d29645c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/318eb4295aa018681aaf42b1b0fbfb13549f9bc4271cfbe0a97d3ebb14758afd/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d293d5c696e742673706163653b70285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d2c5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d29645c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d)

* 전략

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/318eb4295aa018681aaf42b1b0fbfb13549f9bc4271cfbe0a97d3ebb14758afd/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d293d5c696e742673706163653b70285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d2c5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d29645c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/318eb4295aa018681aaf42b1b0fbfb13549f9bc4271cfbe0a97d3ebb14758afd/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d293d5c696e742673706163653b70285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d2c5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d29645c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d)

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > 이때, β는 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/fc9f3dc22eadccba5352379758eae1e9a62c5ca7bd95554a5be3bd104e849ff3/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/fc9f3dc22eadccba5352379758eae1e9a62c5ca7bd95554a5be3bd104e849ff3/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d)에 관한 적분 값.

  > 이를 완전제곱식으로 변형해서 이전의 방법처럼 공분산과 평균벡터 구할 수 있음❗

* 파티션을 위한 이차형식을 다시 살펴보면, 전체 16개 항 중 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/fc9f3dc22eadccba5352379758eae1e9a62c5ca7bd95554a5be3bd104e849ff3/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/fc9f3dc22eadccba5352379758eae1e9a62c5ca7bd95554a5be3bd104e849ff3/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d)를 포함한 항은 7개이며 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/06aea75ec98d899365a837271ebb161c6f74a5b3c0d622c546cd6c23ec123c15/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/06aea75ec98d899365a837271ebb161c6f74a5b3c0d622c546cd6c23ec123c15/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d)를 포함한 항은 5개

  > 정리하면, [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

* [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/430d09fbc23ffd05978cf9916f245f36e33d667a1c3a3b1a579e043532ce4ef2/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f66285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d2c2673706163653b5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/430d09fbc23ffd05978cf9916f245f36e33d667a1c3a3b1a579e043532ce4ef2/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f66285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b627d2c2673706163653b5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d29)를 완전제곱식 형태로 만들기

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.) 치환해서 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/5aefe220de5626501abc9df455d8d1bdb6e355773c57499420efc62e6fb2de27/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c7461753d5c667261637b317d7b327d5c6d61746862667b6d7d5e7b547d5c4c616d6264615f7b62627d5e7b2d317d5c6d61746862667b6d7d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/5aefe220de5626501abc9df455d8d1bdb6e355773c57499420efc62e6fb2de27/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c7461753d5c667261637b317d7b327d5c6d61746862667b6d7d5e7b547d5c4c616d6264615f7b62627d5e7b2d317d5c6d61746862667b6d7d)를 빼주고 더해주면 다음과 같이 변형됨.

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > 이는 공분산 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/252f56611c76659f7a7ceb87181f9dfb9fc23c92e70de0ef7625eb3489a288f6/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c4c616d6264615f7b62627d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/252f56611c76659f7a7ceb87181f9dfb9fc23c92e70de0ef7625eb3489a288f6/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c4c616d6264615f7b62627d)에만 종속되며, [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/06aea75ec98d899365a837271ebb161c6f74a5b3c0d622c546cd6c23ec123c15/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/06aea75ec98d899365a837271ebb161c6f74a5b3c0d622c546cd6c23ec123c15/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d)에는 독립이므로 앞서 설명한 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)의 지수부에 집중하면 됨❗

* 따라서, [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/9dddaa53741a8adda8229c2678bb2a1ffeb57a1cbc15a1b1d20e9e98eadfb92a/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c7461752b67285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d292b5c7465787475707b636f6e73747d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/9dddaa53741a8adda8229c2678bb2a1ffeb57a1cbc15a1b1d20e9e98eadfb92a/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c7461752b67285c6d61746862667b787d5f7b617d292b5c7465787475707b636f6e73747d)에 관해 정리하면,

### 가우시안 분포를 위한 베이즈 정리\(Bayes' Theorem for Gaussian Variables\)

* 주어진 값
  *  [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e7a258f2f0149a354419d5e2acd5e2e887d8ec9ce1289e5ef445860fca4d5ee7/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b787d293d4e285c6d61746862667b787d7c5c6d752c2673706163653b5c4c616d6264615e7b2d317d29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e7a258f2f0149a354419d5e2acd5e2e887d8ec9ce1289e5ef445860fca4d5ee7/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b787d293d4e285c6d61746862667b787d7c5c6d752c2673706163653b5c4c616d6264615e7b2d317d29)
  *  [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)
    * [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/23bf3bee224d368e50b4c0ae7187e911a90e10d99229dad3dcd9a5dc2ad49165/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b797d7c5c6d61746862667b787d29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/23bf3bee224d368e50b4c0ae7187e911a90e10d99229dad3dcd9a5dc2ad49165/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b797d7c5c6d61746862667b787d29)의 평균은 x의 선형함수
    * [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/23bf3bee224d368e50b4c0ae7187e911a90e10d99229dad3dcd9a5dc2ad49165/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b797d7c5c6d61746862667b787d29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/23bf3bee224d368e50b4c0ae7187e911a90e10d99229dad3dcd9a5dc2ad49165/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b797d7c5c6d61746862667b787d29)의 공분산은 x와 독립
* 구할 값 : [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/2c9c5f211ebc9d96efaadebabbaad45de7a6c3a8dda66de6362eebd882bb4d17/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b797d292c2673706163653b70285c6d61746862667b787d7c5c6d61746862667b797d29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/2c9c5f211ebc9d96efaadebabbaad45de7a6c3a8dda66de6362eebd882bb4d17/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b797d292c2673706163653b70285c6d61746862667b787d7c5c6d61746862667b797d29)
* [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)를 위한 결합확률분포 \(이를 통해 공분산, 평균벡터 계산\)

### 가우시안 분포의 최대우도\(Maximum Likelihood for the Gaussian\)

* 가우시안 분포에 의해 데이터 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)가 주어졌을 때 **우도를 최대화하는 파라미터 값\(평균, 공분산\) 찾기**❗
  * 로그 우도 함수

    > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  * 우도를 최대화하는 평균벡터 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/6ca56362bf3a28a8800781fbf7a27690110dd9bcd6fc4cf2b71bfaeb70f7fdb1/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d755f7b4d4c7d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/6ca56362bf3a28a8800781fbf7a27690110dd9bcd6fc4cf2b71bfaeb70f7fdb1/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d755f7b4d4c7d)

    > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/9f1cb71a2cd7d5487d201c56fa4e179741113419fc9cd04f00939fff6b103114/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b797d3d5c6c6566742673706163653b282673706163653b5c6d61746862667b787d2d5c6d752673706163653b5c72696768742673706163653b29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/9f1cb71a2cd7d5487d201c56fa4e179741113419fc9cd04f00939fff6b103114/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746862667b797d3d5c6c6566742673706163653b282673706163653b5c6d61746862667b787d2d5c6d752673706163653b5c72696768742673706163653b29) 치환

### 

### 가우시안 분포를 위한 베이지안 추론\(Bayesian Inference for the Gaussian\)

* MLE방법은 파라미터들[![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/4bba6c7b67765ed5696b96adadc61939d585b97d8d38467aea2694d9aa0ba866/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6c6566742673706163653b285c6d752c2673706163653b5c5369676d612673706163653b5c72696768742673706163653b29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/4bba6c7b67765ed5696b96adadc61939d585b97d8d38467aea2694d9aa0ba866/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6c6566742673706163653b285c6d752c2673706163653b5c5369676d612673706163653b5c72696768742673706163653b29)의 하나의 값만 구했다면, 파라미터의 확률분포 자체를 구할 수 있음❗
* 우도함수 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/bb42d8718ae85a825825b8a6ccda8b032484420537d980824303184f8020f8d4/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b587d7c5c6d7529)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/bb42d8718ae85a825825b8a6ccda8b032484420537d980824303184f8020f8d4/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b587d7c5c6d7529)와 사전확률 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/024f2cdf434c0d2717b850293084248efd5583d83ff601ac1cc1b32b19c5bf4d/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d7529)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/024f2cdf434c0d2717b850293084248efd5583d83ff601ac1cc1b32b19c5bf4d/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d7529)를 통해 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e9906b8136cb627533a60ee4eb218ca6ab7290d9534f0dbd403a660576a93266/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d75)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e9906b8136cb627533a60ee4eb218ca6ab7290d9534f0dbd403a660576a93266/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d75)의 사후확률 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/aba12dfe1788935cea696b3a6f0afd53f9123506c880c1363e312a969015b805/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d757c5c6d61746862667b587d29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/aba12dfe1788935cea696b3a6f0afd53f9123506c880c1363e312a969015b805/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d757c5c6d61746862667b587d29) 구하기❗
  * 분산은 주어졌다고 가정, 단변량 가우시간 확률변수 x의 μ를 베이지안 추론을 통해 구한다.
